original_text: You believers in Ephesus also heard God's true message. You heard the good news about how God saves you. When you believed in Christ, God gave his Holy Spirit to you. He had promised to do that, to show that you belong to him.
korean_text: 그 안에서 너희도 진리의 말씀 곧 너희의 구원의 복음을 듣고 그 안에서 또한 믿어 약속의 성령으로 인치심을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: You believers in Ephesus also heard God's true message.
sentences.korean_translation: 에베소에 있는 신자 여러분도 하나님의 참된 말씀을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: You heard the good news about how God saves you.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 어떻게 당신을 구원하시는지에 대한 좋은 소식을 들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: God gave his Holy Spirit to you.
He had promised to do that,
to show that you belong to him.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 그에게 속해 있음을 보여주기 위함입니다.
